altername_name: Keiba Yosou Shien Soft: Yosou Shinkaron
name: Keiba Yosou Shien Soft: Yosou Shin Karon
overview: This is a horse racing prediction software that allows you to input the data of running horses with ease. Since the ability evaluation logic can be assembled by the user, it is possible to create your own prediction theory as if it were a game. Moreover, you can make improvements based on your experience, so you can create the strongest theory yourself. In addition, for those who do not have the expertise, sample logic boasting an excellent track record is also installed. It can also be used immediately as a mobile phone prediction software.
